statements: SELECT player_name, level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE game_id = 5;
SELECT player_name, experience FROM player_profiles WHERE level >= 10;
SELECT player_name, level, experience FROM player_profiles WHERE game_id = 3 AND level > 5;
SELECT COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, level, experience FROM player_profiles WHERE level > 5 ORDER BY experience DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_id, level FROM player_profiles WHERE experience > 1000 ORDER BY game_id ASC, level DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, level, experience FROM player_profiles WHERE game_id = 3 ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, experience FROM player_profiles WHERE level > 10 AND game_id = 2 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, level, experience FROM player_profiles WHERE game_id IN (1, 3) ORDER BY level ASC, experience DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT player_name, player_experience FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_experience DESC
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 5 ORDER BY player_experience ASC
SELECT player_name, player_statistics.kills, player_statistics.deaths FROM player_profiles JOIN player_statistics ON player_profiles.player_id = player_statistics.player_id
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM player_profiles
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 10 ORDER BY player_experience DESC
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM player_profiles WHERE player_experience BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY player_level ASC

SELECT player_id, game_id, kills, deaths, assists FROM player_statistics JOIN player_profiles ON player_statistics.player_id = player_profiles.player_id WHERE player_level >= 20 ORDER BY kills DESC, deaths ASC
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM player_statistics WHERE assists > 5) ORDER BY player_experience DESC
SELECT * FROM PlayerProfiles;
SELECT player_id, username, email FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM GameStats ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, level FROM GameStats WHERE level > 5;
SELECT player_id, game_id, time_played FROM GameStats WHERE time_played > INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT * FROM PlayerProfiles;
SELECT username, email FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE player_id = '9f341678-4fea-459f-bc1e-9903e61f3186';
SELECT player_id, MAX(score) FROM GameStats GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, game_id, start_time, end_time FROM GameSessions WHERE player_id = 'f9b5a0b4-7705-48e1-98a2-bd52203056df';
SELECT DISTINCT username, email FROM PlayerProfiles;
SELECT * FROM PlayerProfiles;
SELECT id, username, email FROM PlayerProfiles;
SELECT * FROM PlayerStatistics WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT title, genre, release_date FROM GameCatalog ORDER BY release_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, game_id, current_level FROM PlayerProgress WHERE last_played > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email, avatar_url FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE id = 3;
SELECT title, genre, release_date FROM GameCatalog WHERE genre = 'RPG';
SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM PlayerStatistics WHERE player_id = 5 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, current_level, last_played FROM PlayerProgress WHERE game_id = 2 AND current_level < 10;
SELECT player_name, player_location FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_profiles WHERE player_location = 'New York';
SELECT player_name, games_played, total_score FROM player_profiles JOIN player_statistics ON player_profiles.player_id = player_statistics.player_id;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' AND end_time < '2023-01-01';
SELECT player_name, reward_name, reward_date FROM player_profiles JOIN player_rewards ON player_profiles.player_id = player_rewards.player_id WHERE reward_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_profiles WHERE player_location = 'New York';
SELECT player_name, games_played, total_score FROM player_profiles JOIN player_statistics ON player_profiles.player_id = player_statistics.player_id;

SELECT player_name, level_name FROM player_profiles JOIN player_rewards ON player_profiles.player_id = player_rewards.player_id JOIN game_levels ON player_rewards.reward_name = game_levels.level_name;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE player_location != 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY player_name DESC;
